00114 class EGS_BEAM_SOURCE_EXPORT EGS_BeamSource : public EGS_BaseSource {
00115 
00116 public:
00117 
00119     EGS_BeamSource(EGS_Input *, EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0);
00120     ~EGS_BeamSource();
00121 
00122     EGS_I64 getNextParticle(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm,
00123             int &q, int &latch, EGS_Float &E, EGS_Float &wt,
00124             EGS_Vector &x, EGS_Vector &u);
00125     EGS_Float getEmax() const { return Emax; };
00126     EGS_Float getFluence() const { return count; };
00127     bool storeState(ostream &data) const {
00128         return egsStoreI64(data,count);
00129     };
00130     bool setState(istream &data) {
00131         return egsGetI64(data,count);
00132     };
00133     bool addState(istream &data) {
00134         EGS_I64 tmp;
00135         bool res = egsGetI64(data,tmp); count += tmp; return res;
00136     };
00137     void resetCounter() { count = 0; };
00138 
00139     bool isValid() const { return is_valid; };
00140 
00141     void setCutout(EGS_Float xmin, EGS_Float xmax, EGS_Float ymin,
00142             EGS_Float ymax) {
00143         Xmin = xmin; Xmax = xmax; Ymin = ymin; Ymax = ymax;
00144     };
00145 
00146 protected:
00147 
00148     EGS_Library    *lib;    
00149     FinishFunction finish;  
00151     SampleFunction sample;  
00152 
00153     bool        is_valid;
00154     string      the_file_name;
00155     ifstream    the_file;
00156     EGS_Float   Emax;
00157     EGS_I64     count;
00158 
00159     // filters
00160     int         particle_type;
00161     EGS_Float   Xmin, Xmax, Ymin, Ymax;
00162     EGS_Float   wmin, wmax;
00163 
00164     // temporary particle storage
00165     int         q_save, latch_save;
00166     EGS_Float   E_save, wt_save;
00167     EGS_Vector  x_save, u_save;
00168 
00169     // reusing particles
00170     int         n_reuse_photon, n_reuse_electron;
00171     int         i_reuse_photon, i_reuse_electron;
00172 
00173 };
